title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department agriculture food marine) order 2021

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Barry Cassidy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Barry Cassidy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to Martin Heydon, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 19 July 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 September, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [479] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
